title: [TFT] Rek's ability is literally worse than nothing...???
body:
I've been running Rek' Sai for a while now, and consistently found his "ability" to be not just freaking awful, but literally worse than nothing at all.  Half the time he jumps away from his target right before he could kill them, completely negating any targeting value.  Half the time he jumps away from the fight entirely, and pops up a couple hexes away, then has to wander back in.

I literally had a game decided on the fact that my Rek sai was one auto from killing his last guy, Lucian (and me winning the whole match), but then Rek jumped into the ground and...   popped out two hexes away without touching him, giving him free hits that cost me the game???

Seriously.

I legit have never seen his ability land on a single unit that's worth it, and seen countless dozens of enemies get saved because Rek avoids killing them to wander off into the abyss for a couple seconds.  You know something is wrong when you ability helps your enemies....

replies.body:
Yeah I made a topic on this earlier.
TFT Rek'sai's ability is terrible, and she sucks as a unit because of it.

{{champion:421}} 
he?
his?
when did rek transitioned?
SHE IS A QUEEN AND YOU WILL ADDRESS HER AS SUCH

This is kind of an issue with all champs/abilities tbh. The wrong timing on them, wrong target etc. and they harm their own team. I've stomped opponents then been stomped by them 1 round later with almost 0 changes in our setups.

I think the most amusing part is that Riot thinks pure RNG can equal E-sports.
